column4: BIG FAVOR! will someone with a cleanish Feisty install check Synaptic and see if 'libwxgtk2.6-0' is installed by default?  ive downloaded so many headers and whatnot im not sure... trying to write a compile howto and wanna make sure im not leaving something out
i doubt it's installed by default, it's in universe
thanks... i dunno why i didnt think to check that
